name: Gemini
description: Gemini, known as the twin deities Pollux and Castor of divinity and shadow, watches over family and brotherhood.

skills.name: Soothe
skills.description: Castor heals Pollux, restoring HP equal to 240% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Heals HP equal to 270% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level3: Increases Castor's Armor by an additional 30% for the next 8s. (Unlocks at Lv.121)
upgrades.level4: Heals HP equal to 300% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.161)

skills.name: Under My Wing!
skills.description: Pollux consumes 30% of current HP to summon Castor, who will leap into the enemy-clustered area, dealing DMG equal to 240% of ATK to surrounding enemies. If Castor is already on the battlefield, Pollux fully restores Castor's HP and deals DMG equal to 300% of ATK to enemies around Castor. (Castor's base attributes are identical to Pollux's).

upgrades.level2: Castor's HP increases by 20% in battle.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 260% of ATK and 330% of ATK.

skills.name: Fight Alongside
skills.description: Pollux deals DMG equal to 240% of ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK among those currently attacking Castor and blinds them for 3s (Blind: reduces Hit Rate by 80%).

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 270% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.81)
upgrades.level3: Blind now lasts for 4s. (Unlocks at Lv.141)
